example.code: PS C:\> $attribute = New-Object Amazon.ElasticLoadBalancing.Model.PolicyAttribute PS C:\> AttributeName="ProxyProtocol" PS C:\> AttributeValue="true" PS C:\> New-ELBLoadBalancerPolicy -LoadBalancerName my-load-balancer -PolicyName my-ProxyProtocol-policy -PolicyTypeName ProxyProtocolPolicyType -PolicyAttribute $attribute
example.description: This example configures the proxy protocol policy for the specified load balancer.
